net.proteusframework.core.cache

Class AbstractJDBCLoaderWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.cache.AbstractJDBCLoaderWriter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JDBCCacheLoader, JDBCCacheWriter

    abstract class AbstractJDBCLoaderWriter
extends Object
    Helper for implementing JDBC cache loader / writer in this package.
    Author:
    Ken Logan (klogan@venturetech.net)
